metadata.Title: CVE-2020-29260 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: libvncclient v0.9.13 was discovered to contain a memory leak via the function rfbClientCleanup().

criterions.comment: italc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
libvncserver package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
tightvnc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
x11vnc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
